entries.context:

PT playthrough
TR playthrough
EN playthrough

In-Dev:
NL, CA, KO, JP

MERGE CA AND KO TO MAIN BRANCH

Leave NL + JP
World Building Meeting 1: Names, Tone, Humour
World Building Meeting 2: Make Decisions on Names, etc. (They can change!)
Test translation of E1 Stable 1F + E1 Farm
E10 Words; Manual input, add all targeted GameObject, reposition all respawn colliders
Final full playthrough with all translated elements before premiere

entries.utterer: Revisit names to discuss meanings: particularly Bad Ass, Sick Ass, and Human names
Set up Foal name to have Esek
Return to song of ascension phonemes: AA II, AH IH, AAH, IIH, A'H, 'IIH — update video after
Add S-with cedilla to YOLDAS -- Dos font
Revisit Farm House Radio (milton broke it early)
Make all ÖHÖ captials and ensure that single vs. double is correct
Did not test Bad Ass Rescue
Update song of ascension text in E2 B1
EY - Change name of attacks in Butte Battle
Review attacks to be more like Pokemon in E2 battles
Capitalize the attacks in E2 battles
Can we make a really long word for the song of ascension?
Update e1 and e2 names for characters in dialogues
Update to Uncle Kaba to Maternal uncle: Kaba Dayı
PB Localize Zoo in Newspaper: hayvanat bahçesi
Be an Esek not a Ezik
Can we think of a better acronym for Humans Are the Worst
Think about where Tesekkuler (?) fits at the very end of the game in the Epilogue, because it's a very beautiful word within donkey in

entries.utterer: Need to add Punt Volat to all fonts
Create Unicode address for it in foal name select script; What other letters are required? ç?
Check for bad ass to be complete before night called (more complicated)
Radio in E1 Farm House not checked
Look at English battle text to standardize
THIRSTY: Changed Thirsty's region from Northern to Southern with richer vocabulary, losing some age, but accent is strong so it sounds countryside and out of touch with the world
NICE ASS: Nice Ass is still not present, but playing with Gen Z (maybe uses a lot of English language), trying to stay away from caricature
PRONOUNS: L'Expertase vs La Expertase and it depends on where the stress of the vowels; Marc suggests that we keep La even if it's wrong.
Big City Circus sprite is not updated in the newspaper
- Missing UI sprite for current language for Newspaper_CircusTitle
Why are some things struck through on the sheet 11?
Fix Prophet sign and change it to -453 for Ase
Pick font for rhythm game 3D language

Vertical letter with notch is a bit hard to read

entries.utterer: Fix apostraphe at start of sentence

Pass on dialect of Thirsty aim for 80%?

Quite few bodily reference puns/wordplays coming: ears, hoofs, teeth, shit, maw
Some additional to consider: tails, hoef, hides
Return to the Ass Power slogan:
Mecha City >> Mechalen || explore words around mechanization, technology, machines, etc. to appear near it in the text
Achterwerk >> let's see how far we can make Werk go
